long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick and free opening of XML files
Easily edit and view XML files in Google Chrome
Immediately open, edit, and manage your XML files for free in Google Chrome browser. Our "Quick and Free Open XML Files" extension provides you with convenient functionality to directly process XML files in a browser, making file editing and viewing seamless and efficient. Whether it's small adjustments or large-scale editing, all changes can be easily saved to your desktop or Google Drive, ensuring that your workflow is not disrupted.
Main features:
Completely free: No payment required, enjoy complete XML file viewing and editing functionality.
View and Edit: Use our intuitive interface to easily view and edit XML files.
Cloud storage option: After editing, you can choose to save the file to your PC or Google Drive.
Disclaimer:
Please note that this extension was not officially created by Google, but was developed by an independent development team. All relevant copyrights and trademarks belong to their respective owners. Google neither supports nor sponsors this Chrome extension. XML Viewer does not belong to Google Inc., nor is it licensed or a subsidiary of Google Inc.

快速免费打开XML文件

在Google Chrome中轻松编辑和查看XML文件

立即在Google Chrome浏览器中免费打开、编辑和管理您的XML文件。我们的“快速免费打开XML文件”扩展为您提供直接在浏览器中处理XML文件的便捷功能，让文件编辑和查看变得无缝且高效。无论是小型调整还是大规模编辑，所有更改都可以轻松保存到您的桌面或Google Drive，确保您的工作流程不受干扰。

主要特点:

完全免费: 无需支付费用，享受完整的XML文件查看和编辑功能。
查看和编辑: 使用我们直观的界面，轻松查看和编辑XML文件。
云存储选项: 编辑完成后，可选择将文件保存到PC或Google Drive。
免责声明:
请注意，此扩展非由Google官方创建，而是由一个独立开发团队开发。所有相关版权和商标归其各自所有者所有。谷歌公司既不支持也不赞助此Chrome扩展。XML Viewer不属于Google Inc.，也未受其许可或成为其子公司。
